casebody.data:
Thursday, May 29, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

96-2301. State v. Palmer.

Belmont App. No. 89B28. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Belmont County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for continuance of oral argument currently scheduled for 9:00 a.m. on June 25,1997,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for continuance of oral argument be, and hereby is, granted, and oral argument is continued to 9:30 a.m. on August 26,1997.
